EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations - Community Solar Contract Received!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Name},
Your Community Solar contract has been received and fully executed. You will receive your fully executed copy of the agreement from DocuSign within two business days.
If you do not receive the fully executed contract in your email, or if you have any other questions, please contact us at
You should receive an invitation to access your Member Portal shortly. In your Member Portal you will receive updates on the system's construction and be able to view its production once built. You will also gain visibility into your savings and also be able to communicate with other members of the BlueWave Community .
Please let us know if you ever have any questions.
Welcome to BlueWave!
Sincerely,
The Customer Care Team
